attributes.action: Give young young people a say in the decisions that affect their education.
attributes.background: When a decision is being made that relates to education make provision for representation from students who have either been affected or will be affected by the decision. This petition ensures their voices are heard and they have a say in the decision making process that affects their future.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the Government to take to give young people a say.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to make any consultations about changes to education policy available in schools and colleges if that is something you would like to see happen.
